autoplay.description: Whether to start the countdown automatically, if false, you need to manually call the start method. See description above
autoplay.description_zh: 是否自动开始倒计时，如果为false，需手动调用开始方法。见上方说明

separator.description: 分隔符,colon为英文冒号,zh为中文
separator.description_zh: 分隔符,colon为英文冒号,zh为中文

separator-size.description: The font size of the separator, in rpx
separator-size.description_zh: 分隔符的字体大小，单位rpx

show-border.description: Whether to display the border of the countdown number
show-border.description_zh: 是否显示倒计时数字的边框

border-color.description: The color of the digital border

bg-color.description: The background color of the countdown number
bg-color.description_zh: 倒计时数字的背景颜色

color.description: The color of the countdown number

height.description: The numeric height value (the width is equivalent to this value), depending on whether the border needs to be set when setting the border, in rpx
height.description_zh: 数字高度值(宽度等同此值)，设置边框时看情况是否需要设置此值，单位rpx

show-days.description: Whether or not to display the Days portion of the countdown
show-days.description_zh: 是否显示倒计时的"天"部分

show-hours.description: Whether to display the Time portion of the countdown
show-hours.description_zh: 是否显示倒计时的"时"部分

show-minutes.description: Whether or not to display the "points" part of the countdown
show-minutes.description_zh: 是否显示倒计时的"分"部分

show-seconds.description: Whether to display the "seconds" part of the countdown
show-seconds.description_zh: 是否显示倒计时的"秒"部分

hide-zero-day.description: When the Day part is 0, hide the field
hide-zero-day.description_zh: 当"天"的部分为0时，隐藏该字段

events.name: change
events.description: During the countdown process, it is triggered once per second
events.description_zh: 倒计过程中，每秒触发一次
events.params: timestamp: 当前剩余的倒计秒数
